Summary: was awoken by freinds and shown the object as we were sleeping out side.
trends: There have been no other sightings in bertrand
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi two other boys and my little brother were sleeping outside in the neighbours yard. i had fallen asleep when the two other boys shook me awake and said look up there. thats when i saw the object.there was no mistaking what the object was it was disc shaped with a dome and glowing red like red hot metal i couldnt hear any sound coming from it. i looked as thou it was decending. i know this is going to sound funny but it looked like the pizza hut logo. my feeling at the time was big deal ufos and sightings were common back then. it was visable for about 7 seconds. this object made regular passes and was seen at differant times by differant people.
